TopicTitle: Changing command pod in the vab

Articles.Content: Hey love what's going on with kc and were it's going. Quick question. In the vab can you/how do you change your command vehicle? Thanks.
You can't change it on a existing ship sadly. You have to create a new ship and then bit a different pod.

You can't change it while in the VAB but you can change it by editing the craft file and resetting it in the VAB. Search the forums for details on how.

Cheers!
